job_tasks.phrase: Ontwikkeling van web- en mobiele applicaties: Het ontwerp en de bouw van gebruiksvriendelijke applicaties
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the core software engineering task of designing and building applications.

job_tasks.phrase: Integratie van de dienst in gebruikersapplicaties: Meehelpen aan de integratie van de S2T-dienst in bestaande gebruikersapplicaties.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions integrating a service into existing applications, which falls under software integration.

job_tasks.phrase: Bijdragen aan de ontwikkeling van de middleware-layer, waar de API-definitie wordt gerealiseerd en authenticatie plaatsvindt.
job_tasks.justification: Developing a middleware layer, including API definitions and authentication, is a core software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: De LLM's moeten via virtualisatietechnieken gedeployed worden op de Nvidia-stack.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the deployment of LLMs using specific technologies (virtualization, Nvidia stack), aligning with the operational aspects of deploying ML/GenAI models in production.

job_tasks.phrase: De engineer werkt hier aan een schaalbaar, multi-tenant model.
job_tasks.justification: Designing for scalability and multi-tenancy are fundamental software engineering principles for building robust systems.

job_tasks.phrase: Bepaalt prioriteiten en geeft de benodigde acties, tijd en middelen aan om ervoor te zorgen dat activiteiten plaats vinden en zaken geregeld worden.
job_tasks.justification: This describes project management, resource allocation, and ensuring activities are coordinated, which falls under understanding business needs and strategic planning for execution.

job_tasks.phrase: Evalueert de voortgang en stelt waar nodig de planning en opzet bij.
job_tasks.justification: Evaluating progress and adjusting plans is a key aspect of business understanding and strategic management of projects.

soft_skills.phrase: Contacten - De programma manager. - Het ontwikkelteam. - De technische beheerder.
Bepaalt prioriteiten en geeft de benodigde acties, tijd en middelen aan om ervoor te zorgen dat activiteiten plaats vinden en zaken geregeld worden.

profile.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on software development and integration tasks (building applications, middleware, APIs) and operational aspects of deploying LLMs. It does not include any tasks related to model development, fine-tuning, prompt engineering, or RAG. Therefore, it aligns with an AI-Adjacent Software Engineer profile, which involves building software that integrates AI/ML features.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad clearly outlines software development and integration tasks, along with operational aspects of deploying LLMs. While the title might suggest deeper ML involvement, the described responsibilities are specific enough to confidently classify the role as AI-Adjacent Software Engineer.
